LanguageData.Bullet_MechanoidBlasterTurret.label: Laser salvo
LanguageData.Gun_MechanoidBlasterTurret.label: Mechanoid Blaster
LanguageData.Gun_MechanoidBlasterTurret.description: Evolved defense building, primarily made for stationary warfare against xenomorphic insectoids and mechanoid swarms - on planets of importance. Has 4 Blaster Cannons with a long range target acquisition attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret of a sturdy nature. Relies on Mechanoid Technology.
LanguageData.Gun_MechanoidBlasterTurretEnhanced.label: Mechanoid Blaster Enhanced
LanguageData.Gun_MechanoidBlasterTurretEnhanced.descr: Evolved defense building, primarily made for stationary warfare against xenomorphic insectoids and mechanoid swarms - on planets of importance. Has 4 Blaster Cannons with a long range target acquisition attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret of a sturdy nature. Relies on Mechanoid Technology. Upgraded.
LanguageData.MPC_MechanoidBlasterTurret.label: Mechanoid Blaster
LanguageData.MPC_MechanoidBlasterTurret.description:
A turret with a mechanoid blaster on top that automatically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode in an EMP impulse when damaged.
Evolved defense building, primarily made for stationary warfare against xenomorphic insectoids and mechanoid swarms - on planets of importance. Has 4 Blaster Cannons with a long range target acquisition attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret of a sturdy nature. Relies on Mechanoid Technology. Can be upgraded.
